member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.param: Número de Identificación Tributaria o Carnet de Identidad
fecha de transaccion de la forma AAAAMMDD

member.summary: Agrega N digitos d Verhoeff a una cadena
member.param: cadena donde agregar digitos de Verhoeff
member.returns: cadena original + N digitos de Verhoeff

member.param: cadena que contiene el numero a redondear de la forma 123 ; 123.6 123,6

member.name: T:Facturacion.Verhoeff
member.summary: For more information cf. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Verhoeff_algorithm Dihedral Group: http://mathworld.wolfram.com/DihedralGroup.html

member.name: M:Facturacion.Verhoeff.validateVerhoeff(System.String)
member.summary: Validates that an entered number is Verhoeff compliant.
member.returns: True if Verhoeff compliant, otherwise false
member.remarks: Make sure the check digit is the last one!

member.name: M:Facturacion.Verhoeff.generateVerhoeff(System.String)
member.summary: For a given number generates a Verhoeff digit
member.remarks: Append this check digit to num
